---
title: "Scatter Plot Regression Quiz"
author: "Haley Uyeunten"
date: '2022-04-21'
output: html_document
---

```{r}
library(tidyverse)
```

```{r}
cars <- read_csv("mtcars11.csv")
```

```{r}
ggplot(data = cars, mapping = aes(x = wt, y = mpg)) +
  geom_point() +
  geom_smooth(method = "lm", formula = y ~ x) +
  labs(x = "Weight (1000 lbs)", y = "Miles/(US) Gallon")
```
